articles.title: Twisted Edison: Filaments curling at the nanoscale produce light waves that twirl as they travel - Phys.org
articles.description: Bright, twisted light can be produced with technology similar to an Edison light bulb, researchers at the University of Michigan have shown. The finding adds nuance to fundamental physics while offering a new avenue for robotic vision systems and other applic…
